content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position (0, 0)) with automation research and requires automation-science-pack for operation.

### Furnace at position(4, -63)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (4, -63)) with coal as fuel and currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Electric Pole at position(-1, 0)
Proposed position for the electric pole, but placement was unsuccessful due to obstruction.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing an electric pole
- Ensure the target location is clear of other entities before attempting to place an electric pole. Check for any obstructions in the area.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
